snippet: Mr. Nuttall, a European Parliament member for the conflicted, anti-immigration party, is taking a job that many others have been unwilling or unable to hold....
abstract: United Kingdom Independence Party picks Paul Nuttall to replace Nigel Farage as leader; shuffle is latest move in spectacle surrounding right-wing, anti-immigration party.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Nuttall, a European Parliament member for the conflicted, anti-immigration party, is taking a job that many others have been unwilling or unable to hold.

headline.main: U.K. Independence Party Picks Paul Nuttall to Replace Nigel Farage as Leader
headline.print_headline: U.K. Independence Party Chooses a Leader to Replace Farage
